papers.title: THGNets: Constrained Temporal Hypergraphs and Graph Neural Networks in Hyperbolic Space for Information Diffusion Prediction
papers.summary_motivation:
[AI generated] Predicting information diffusion on temporal hypergraphs in hyperbolic space.
[翻译]
在双曲空间中预测时序超图上的信息传播。
papers.summary_innovation:
[AI generated] Proposes a hyperbolic temporal hypergraph neural network for information diffusion prediction.
[翻译]
提出了一种用于信息扩散预测的双曲时序超图神经网络。
papers.summary_method:
[AI generated] Proposes THGNets, a framework that models information diffusion as constrained temporal hypergraphs and processes them using graph neural networks in hyperbolic space.
[翻译]
提出THGNets框架，将信息扩散建模为约束时序超图，并在双曲空间中使用图神经网络进行处理。
papers.summary_conclusion:
[AI generated] THGNets achieves state-of-the-art performance in information diffusion prediction by modeling temporal hypergraphs in hyperbolic space.
[翻译]
THGNets通过在双曲空间中建模时序超图，在信息传播预测任务上取得了最先进的性能。
papers.summary_limitation:
[AI generated] The framework's reliance on hyperbolic space may limit its applicability to datasets where hyperbolic geometry is not the optimal representation.
[翻译]
该框架对双曲空间的依赖，可能限制了其在双曲几何非最优表示的数据集上的适用性。
papers.title_translation:
[AI generated] 中文标题：THGNets：双曲空间中用于信息扩散预测的约束时序超图与图神经网络

（注：标题翻译力求准确传达原文的技术要点：“Constrained Temporal Hypergraphs”译为“约束时序超图”，强调时间维度与约束条件；“Hyperbolic Space”采用学界通用译法“双曲空间”；“Information Diffusion Prediction”译为“信息扩散预测”符合计算社会科学领域术语规范。整体结构保持“方法+应用场景”的学术标题
papers.analogy_summary: [AI generated] This method models dynamic information spread as a hypergraph evolving on a curved surface, predicting its flow like tracing ripples in a warped pond. [翻译]该方法将动态信息传播建模为在弯曲曲面上演化的超图，预测其流动如同追踪弯曲池塘中的涟漪。
